    • Uses of Link in org.apache.reef.wake.remote.transport

      Methods in org.apache.reef.wake.remote.transport that return Link 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> Link<T> Transport.get(SocketAddress remoteAddr)
      Returns a link for the remote address if already cached; otherwise, returns null
      <T> Link<T> Transport.open(SocketAddress remoteAddr, Encoder<? super T> encoder, LinkListener<? super T> listener)
      Returns a link for the remote address if cached; otherwise opens, caches and returns When it opens a link for the remote address, only one attempt for the address is made at a given time
